mapper.select: SELECT m.match_id, m.match_title, m.match_created_at, m.match_modified_at, m.user_no, m.match_date, m.SVCID, m.match_closed, m.gender_condition, m.match_description, m.match_status, m.match_board_status, m.match_code, s.SVCNM, s.PLACENM, s.X, s.Y, s.IMG_PATH, s.TELNO, s.SUBPLACENM, s.ORGNM, s.SVCENDTELNO, s.AREANM, s.ADRES FROM `match` m JOIN stadium s ON m.SVCID COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci = s.SVCID COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci WHERE m.match_id = #{match_id}
